mapper.select: SELECT t.ID, t.DID, t.SID, t.translationText, t.representationText, t.wltranscriptionText, t.transcriptionText, t.shellText, t.onsetText, t.finalText, t.nuclensText, t.codaText, t.toneText, t.shellWilleText, t.onsetWilleText, t.finalWilleText, t.nuclensWilleText, t.codaWilleText, t.integrated FROM syllableTibet t WHERE t.DID = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO syllableTibet( ID, DID, SID, translationText, representationText, wltranscriptionText, transcriptionText, shellText, onsetText, finalText, nuclensText, codaText, toneText, shellWilleText, onsetWilleText, finalWilleText, nuclensWilleText, codaWilleText, integrated ) VALUES( #{ID}, #{DID}, #{SID}, #{translationText}, #{representationText}, #{wltranscriptionText}, #{transcriptionText}, #{shellText}, #{onsetText}, #{finalText}, #{nuclensText}, #{codaText}, #{toneText}, #{shellWilleText}, #{onsetWilleText}, #{finalWilleText}, #{nuclensWilleText}, #{codaWilleText}, #{integrated} )
